DOC.brief_summary: The purposes of this study are to determine the safety and side effects of LY3000328, to determine how well the body will tolerate LY3000328, and to determine how long LY3000328 remains in the body.
DOC.brief_title: A Study to Evaluate the Safety and Tolerability of LY3000328 in Healthy Participants
DOC.criteria: Are overtly healthy males or females, as determined by medical history and physical examination
